sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Tuscany from '../DB/Tuscany.json'; import '../styles/Tour_Packages.css'; import clndr from '../assets/home/icons/clndr.svg' import ppl from '../assets/home/icons/grp.svg' export default function Tour_Packages() { return (
{Tuscany.map((tour, index) => (

{tour.title}

from {Tuscany.price}

{tour.visit}

{tour.people} PP.

{tour.short_description}

{/* Optional section for additional information */}
))}
); }
